page.title: 14Shopping in Dulverton
page.content: Dulverton has many useful{shops that other local villages lack,and this makes the town a{main shopping {centre}for the Southern part of Exmoor. There are 5 food shops,and over 20 non-food shops.There is a bakers,butchers,chemist,ironmongers,2 shoeshops including one cobbler,a sweet shop,a newsagents,two hairdressers,four clothes shops,a fishing tackle and gun shop,two green _grocers,a post office,and several gift shops. Many customers are local and enjoy a good chat with the shop Keepers. Local news is passed about in this way.Severl local people do tend to use the cash and carry shops in Tiverton or Minehead,some miles away.
